catList: The goal of this course is to show the relevance and importance of mathematical modeling as a process of understanding and solving a large variety of complex business problems. The course is oriented toward both problem recognition and problem solving. It uses MS Excel spreadsheets to formulate and solve problems from a wide variety of business areas, such as operations management, finance and marketing.   Some of the mathematical modeling techniques that are covered in the course are linear programming, nonlinear programming, nonlinear programming, decision trees and queuing models.

The primary goal of this course is to show the relevance and importance of mathematical modeling as a process of understanding and solving a large variety of complex business problems. The course is oriented toward both problem formulation and problem solving. It uses MS Excel spreadsheets to formulate and solve problems from a wide variety of business areas, such as operations management, finance, accounting, human resources, and marketing. Some of the mathematical modeling techniques that are covered in the course are linear programming, nonlinear programming, decision trees and probabilistic models.

The primary goal of this course is to show the relevance and importance of mathematical modeling as a process of understanding and solving a large variety of complex business problems. The course is oriented toward both problem formulation and problem solving. It uses MS Excel spreadsheets to formulate and solve problems from a wide variety of business areas, such as operations management, finance, accounting, human resources, and marketing. The focus is on mathematical programming techniques of linear programming and integer  programming.
